product_name: Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great stretch and cozy synthetic insulation make the women's Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket a perfect layer for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where mobility is key. Front panels contain Thermal R(TM) synthetic insulation that offers warmth, low bulk and excellent packability and insulates even if wet. Ripstop-nylon shell fabric over the insulated panels features a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Hood, arms, sides and back are made of soft, warm Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece. Full-length front zipper; soft collar lining and chin guard. Lightweight stretch binding at cuffs and bottom hem; thumbholes hold sleeves in place over hands. Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket for women features zippered hand pockets. Athletic, close-fitting cut aids warmth without inhibiting movement. Closeout.
short_description: Great stretch and cozy synthetic insulation make the women's Marmot Variant Hoodie Jacket a perfect layer for climbing excursions, ski trips or other cold-weather adventures where mobility is key.
